definitions.text: a kind of religious song originated by Blacks in the southern United States
concerned with sacred matters or religion or the church
examples: a member of a religious order

definitions.text: concerned with or affecting the spirit or soul
lacking material body or form or substance; ; -Lewis Mumford
examples: the vital transcendental soul belonging to the spiritual realm

definitions.text: resembling or characteristic of a phantom
examples: a ghostly face at the window
a phantasmal presence in the room
